content: a fun little mushroom knitting pattern for intermediate knitters these mushrooms are knit in the round on double-pointed needles and make a great addition to your autumn-inspired home decoration it takes about **2 hours to finish one** and you only need scrap quantities of fingering yarn they are knit on 2 00 mm dpns but you can pretty much knit them with any yarn/needle size they ll be bigger and not lifesized then but that could be beautiful as well the pattern is written instructions only and the most important/difficult steps are supported by pictures there are video tutorials for all knitting techniques available on top of that you ll only need scraps of fingering yarn there is a second alternative included in this pattern for advanced knitters in this case you will need two sets of dpns errata both fixed if you download it now - round 7 was missing a k2 it should have been k1 *kll k3 kll k3* **k2** - the advanced version you need to knit one more round in white round 53 *k3 kll k6 kll k3* 56 stitches and then you need to join after round 1 and not after round 2
